channel.title: PURE command need help using massacred source(317)
channel.description:
hi guys i keep trying to add the ::pure and ::master command but it keeps giving me errors like 100 of them can anyone please make me one or tell me how to fix it?
I OWN CAMELOT PVP :)

item.title: PURE command need help using massacred source(317)
item.dc:creator: @kambo77 kambo77
item.description:
@kambo77 wrote:

@kambo77 Here. 
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 3) {
for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
addSkillXP(14000000, i);
}
}

@ Pure command.

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 0) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(140000000, 5); addSkillXP(140000000, 6); }

gave me 100 errors wtf whyyyy :((((

Read full topic

for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
addSkillXP(14000000, i);
}
}

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 0) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(140000000, 5); addSkillXP(140000000, 6); }

item.title: PURE command need help using massacred source(317)
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

[code]String[] cmd = command.split(" ");

if (cmd[0].equals(“pure”)) {
for (int level = 0; level < 6; level++) {
if (level != 1) {
playerXP[level] = getXPForLevel(100);
playerLevel[lvl] = p.getLevelForXP(playerXP[level]);
setSkillLevel(level, playerLevel[level], playerXP[level]);
updateRequired = true;
}
}
}
if (cmd[0].equals(“master”)) {
for (int level = 0; level < 6; level++) {
playerXP[level] = getXPForLevel(100);
playerLevel[lvl] = p.getLevelForXP(playerXP[level]);
setSkillLevel(level, playerLevel[level], playerXP[level]);
updateRequired = true;
}
}[/code]

Add that in with all your other commands.

Read full topic
